body:
I really want to start a youtube channel i have all the stuff for it but i dont have the time i was wondering if someone from avicus wanted to do a channel with me if so just tell me in game or in this thread 

Thanks

title: Youtube

replies.body:
To be successful you don't need to upload very often, if you just want it to be a hobby only upload when you really feel like it. 
All the best of luck if you do start a channel!
